name: Snek (Snepica Studios)
description:
Programmer: Maurice van Veen

This game is currently free to play!
(Windows, Mac & Linux)

Info:
Snek is a Snake game where you can move freely and you gain points by collecting green orbs or going through portals. Snek has multiple modes: Classic, Portal and Avoid. Make screenshots of your highscores and gain as many points as possible for all the different modes.

How to play:
To Play this game you only need to use either W,A,S,D, the Arrow Keys on your Keyboard or your Left and Right Mouse Buttons. Gain points by collecting Green Orbs. After gaining points the Snake grows in size. Stay inside the square and don't touch the Snake's tail.
